data.oai_dc:dc: Stable Silicon Isotopes data, biogenic opal concentrations and bulk sediment nitrogen isotope data of Trigger cores M772-024, 005 and 003 off Peru
The data includes silicon isotope signatures, biogenic opal concentrations and bulk sediment nitrogen isotope signatures of three short cores between 11 and 15 degrees South of the Peruvian Coast.

AGE, Biogenic silica, Climate - Biogeochemistry Interactions in the Tropical Ocean, DEPTH, sediment/rock, Event label, Latitude of event, Longitude of event, M77/2, M77/2_003-2, M77/2_005-3, M77/2_024-5, M77/2_636-1, M77/2_647-1, M77/2_677, Meteor (1986), PC, Piston corer, SFB754, Standard deviation, δ15N, δ30Si, biogenic silica
